checked.description:
If `true`, the checkbox will be checked.
You'll need to pass `onChange` to update its value (since it is now controlled)

colorPalette.description: The color palette of the component

disabled.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be disabled

focusable.description:
If `true` and `disabled` is passed, the checkbox will
remain tabbable but not interactive

indeterminate.description:
If `true`, the checkbox will be indeterminate.
This only affects the icon shown inside checkbox
and does not modify the checked property.

invalid.description:
If `true`, the checkbox is marked as invalid.
Changes style of unchecked state.

name.description:
The name of the input field in a checkbox
(Useful for form submission).

readOnly.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be readonly

required.description:
If `true`, the checkbox input is marked as required,
and `required` attribute will be added

value.description:
The value to be used in the checkbox input.
This is the value that will be returned on form submission.
